custom_css: /* Styling for the services list */.services-container {max-width: 600px; margin: auto; padding: 20px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center;}
.service-list li {background: #f9f9f9; margin: 10px auto; padding: 15px; border-left: 5px solid #d69074; max-width: 800px;}

settings.custom_liquid:
{% comment %} This Liquid template generates a list of all bike services offered. {% endcomment %}

FREE ESTIMATES

Tune-Up Packages

Does your bike need a lot of love? Save money with a tune-up package! (Service parts and fluids not included)

  • Adjustment Package (Free with any new bike purchase!) - $80
    Safety Check on all nuts and bolts, front and rear brake adjustments, front and rear shifting adjustments, frame wipe down, lubricate chain, on-bike minor wheel true. $108 value!
  • Standard Tune-up - $135
    Adjustment Package + Off-bike wheel trues, component wipe down, external bearing adjustments (headset, front and rear hub, bottom bracket). $253 value!
  • Standard Tune-up with Drivetrain Cleaning - $225
    Standard Tune-up + Complete off-bike drivetrain cleaning. $303 value!
  • Complete Road Bike Tune-Up - $340
    Annual Tune-up + Overhaul all bearing surfaces, bleed front and rear brakes, any labor to install new and replace any new parts. Minimum $545 value.
  • Complete Mountain Bike Tune-Up - $475
    Annual Tune-up + Overhaul all bearing surfaces, bleed front and rear brakes, any labor to install and replace any new parts, rebuild suspension fork, rebuild rear shock, linkage bearing replacement. Includes any labor to install new and replace old parts. Minimum $1027 value.

General Labor Items

Prices on our most common services:

  • Inner Tube and/or Tire Install - $20 ($15 if wheel is off bike)
  • Derailleur Adjustment - $20 (Per derailleur)
  • Brake Adjustment - $20 (Per brake)
  • Tubeless Set Up - $28 (Per wheel, sealant, valves, and tape not included)
  • Chain Install - $20 ($15 if chain is purchased from shop)
  • Wheel True - $20-40 (Depending on severity)
  • Brake Cable or Pad Install - $30
  • Derailleur Cable Install - $30
  • Derailleur Install - $35
  • Headset Adjustment - $15
  • Bottom Bracket Adjustment - $20

Labor Rate

Hourly Labor Rate - $120
All of our labor pricing is based on a $120 hourly rate. If we don't have a price for a specific service you are looking to get done, this is how we will price the work.
